name: A whirl of freezing winds
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity a bit.
It increases the users constitution a bit.
It increases the users intelligence pathetically.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (poor in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users cold resistance adequately.
